name: Sonic Advan't
description:
Sonic is on a mysterious "dream", collect enough rings to unlock the door and "wake up" from the "dream"

Controls:

    Move with Left and Right arrows, or A and D.

    Jump with Space.

    Music Control: Previous Song with key O, Skip Song with key P

    I think you can play with a controller, idk
